title: River Spirit Nami's Tail
body:
Hey everybody,

When playing River Spirit Nami for the past few days, I noticed that her tail  is a little wonky. Before the large fin on the end of her tail, there are the two smaller fins on either side. The one on the right side appears to have folded into her tail model, and it doesn't look like it normally should.

Her gameplay is not affected in any way by this bug, but it has been bothering me a bit.

Cheers,
Acolyte Tel Fyr

replies.body: Hi! Thanks for the report! I just took a look at her in game, and you're totally right - her fin's collapsed. D: I'll get a bug written up and let the team know. ^-^

Any news on this? It's been a couple of patches since I reported this and it's still not fixed as of Patch 6.20...

Thank you for your reply :)

Hello! 

Let me follow up today. We've been elbows deep, both in the Star Guardian project and the Teemoing skins!
No worries. Thanks for following up! The Skins Team does excellent work, so please take your time. :)
